name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
After Chinese actor Wang Xing lost contact and was rescued at the Thai-Myanmar border, on January 7, in a mutual aid group for the families of trapped people in Myanmar with 487 members (the number continues to increase), the group owner used an online document to count the information of the trapped people. So far, more than 600 family members have filled it out. The document was eventually named "Stars Go Home Plan" 
As of now, the Weibo topic #495 Mutual Aid Group is counting the information of trapped people in Myanmar# has been banned by Weibo.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At 21:47 Beijing time, there was no content related to Southeast Asian cyber fraud in the top 50 of Weibo's hot search list.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At present, the comment area of Wu Jing's wife Xie Nan's Douyin account has been flooded with netizens posting Wu Jing memes, "Where's the passport brother?" "Call Wu Jing" and other comments in the comment area. 
Previously, Wu Jing said: "A Chinese passport may not allow you to go anywhere in the world, but a Chinese passport can bring you back from anywhere in the world."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 7, Shaanxi. A Lalamove driver said that he received an order, and the person who placed the order transferred a sum of money to him and asked him to transfer the money to another consignee. After the driver arrived at the designated location and gave the money to the consignee, his WeChat wallet was frozen by the Fuzhou police in Jiangxi, and he needed to go to Fuzhou, Jiangxi to deal with it.
The driver said: I am almost 40 years old and have never committed a crime. How can I be suspected of money laundering? Why is it so difficult for me to make some money? What should I do?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 8, in Liuzhou, Guangxi, local residents protested at the gate of Liuzhou Zhongran because the cost of replacing gas meters with smart meters increased significantly.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 8, a Guangzhou men's basketball player was suspended for packing his girlfriend into a suitcase and bringing her back to the dormitory, and staying up all night to help her with her homework.
The next day, the Guangzhou team lost the game 90-103.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, hundreds of people have asked for help on Douyin, looking for their sons, husbands, brothers, etc. who disappeared on the Yunnan border. Most of their relatives were deceived to northern Myanmar, and the last place they appeared was at the border of Xishuangbanna, Yunnan. Most of the missing people were deceived by job introductions or loans. For such rampant human trafficking abuse, even if it is related to fraud, the police in some areas will not file a case. Some family members suspect that there is collusion between northern Myanmar and the local government and public security.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 9, the Chinese Football Association was approved to be established, becoming the first national non-governmental organization.
The "separation of management and operation" of Chinese football was determined as the reform direction of the Chinese professional football league as early as 2010, but even after the establishment of the Football Association in 2015, there has been no substantial progress.
This time, the Football Association established the Chinese Football Association to further strengthen the separation of management and operation. In the future, the Football Association will focus on formulating rules and supervising events, while the specific league operations will be the responsibility of the Chinese Football Association.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Math exam changed to Chinese?
On January 9, the final math exam in Nanshan District, Shenzhen was too difficult, and some schools temporarily announced that the exam time would be extended by 20 minutes.
Some teachers said that if children do not have strong reading comprehension skills in this math exam, just reading the questions will make them collapse! Some netizens even left messages saying "The most abstract test paper, the most miserable parents", "This is the math test paper given by the Chinese teacher"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The municipal party secretary called on law enforcement departments: Have compassion and don't trample on such people when they are in the most difficult time and when they need help the most.
I don't look at how many laws you have enforced, but how many legacy issues and contradictions you have solved and how much goodwill you have released.
-- On January 7, Zhou Lizhi, secretary of the Jishou Municipal Party Committee, delivered a speech on implementing the spirit of the economic work conference of the Central Committee, the Provincial Committee, and the State Committee, and doing a good job in the city's economic work in 2025.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A netizen added: Shenzhen Nanshan District is the place with the most thorough double reduction, but this final exam was surprisingly difficult. The fourth grade test papers are very abstract.
"What you learn is to ride a bicycle to school, and the test is to drive a tractor to plow the field"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution: Sanhe City, Hebei Province Zhongtong Express divides each village and town into delivery areas and non-delivery areas. Schools, enterprises and institutions can be delivered, but villages will not deliver at all. They only call to notify customers to pick up the items themselves, otherwise they will be returned and complaints are useless. 
Express delivery companies can divide people into different classes. People who spend the same freight do not receive the same treatment. 
But it is worth noting that even if the law requires express delivery to be delivered to the door, the delivery fee is now as low as a few cents.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 9, Global Times video: "After visiting China and expressing his deep emotion that "socialism is achieved through hard work", a foreign producer began to study "Mao Zedong's poems" after returning home"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizens summarized the four major doubts about Wang Xing being trafficked to northern Myanmar, questioning whether the fraud group colluded with Chinese government personnel
Why did Weibo suppress the heat, and the police and embassy shirk responsibility and delay
Why was it possible to rescue quickly after the incident became a big deal, but only Wang Xing was rescued, while the 49 people who were locked in the same building were not rescued
Finally, why is the boss who planned the trafficking of Wang Xing, whose company has a history of trafficking causing the disappearance of dozens or hundreds of people, still able to operate a company in China?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution: On January 6, a huge photo of Xi Jinping was hung at the Standing Committee meeting of the Tibet Party Committee
Further align with Mao Zedong

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to Free Asia, the Japanese netizen’s B-station account was banned for 30 days after a video he uploaded flashed a Winnie the Pooh image. But after he posted an apology on Twitter, the original 30-day ban was extended to a permanent ban.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/L2OQInqOcy

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to human rights group Safeguard Defenders, more than 1 million Chinese sought asylum abroad during Xi Jinping’s rule (2012-2024).
Compared to pre-Covid, the number of Chinese asylum seekers in 2024 will increase by 169% to 176,239.
To put it in another perspective, the number of Chinese asylum seekers abroad in 2022 alone is the same as in the entire 10 years of Hu Jintao’s rule.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In July 24, the National Audit Office randomly checked more than 100 counties, and more than 41% of the counties had misappropriated more than 2 billion yuan of rural student nutrition meal subsidies by lowering meal standards and purchasing low-quality food, which was used to compensate debts and distribute welfare. On December 22, CCTV reported that 66 counties had returned 2 billion yuan of arrears of subsidies through the original channels and punished 1,200 people. However, the low-standard ingredients that have been eaten by students and the nutrition that has not entered the mouths of students may never be compensated.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the owners of Guomao Tianqin in Fuzhou and Xiamen, Fujian Province, collectively defended their rights and issued a notice of refusal to accept the house.
It is reported that these two real estate projects were developed by the state-owned enterprise Guomao Group and the state-owned military enterprise Poly Group, but the quality of the houses they built was seriously inconsistent with the name of state-owned enterprises and central enterprises.
The owners complained: The community rushed to deliver the houses and made shoddy work, and delivered the houses when many places were not completed. They used the cheap soft furnishings of Pinduoduo, and even used second-hand furniture.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Philippine authorities raided an online fraud center in Manila and arrested about 400 foreigners, including many Chinese citizens.
China's Foreign Ministry responded: I don't know about the situation you just mentioned. China's position on combating online fraud crimes has always been clear.
Netizen: "Even the street sweeper knows it, but you say you don't know it" "He just doesn't want to answer!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to Bloomberg data, compared with 2019, the source of foreign tourists to China in 2024 has changed: 
The largest increases are from Vietnam, Mongolia, Russia, Malaysia and Thailand. 
The largest decreases are from the United States, South Korea, Switzerland, Sweden and Australia.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 9, Shanghai. On Metro Line 7, an old man misunderstood the sign of the love seat and forced a young man to give up his seat, and angrily accused him of not understanding Shanghai's rules and being a farmer.
Witness passenger said: "The old man thought that the elderly, the weak, the sick and the disabled should have four seats, so he thought the young man sitting in the second seat should give him his seat"
Shanghai Metro: "We have set up a love seat for each group, and there are signs at the back. Giving up seats is voluntary. It is a deviation in understanding to think that the whole group is a love seat, and it is also a very rare thing"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 9 (Released) Zhejiang Shaoxing "New Hope Cup" 2024 Xinchang County Youth Science and Technology Innovation Competition Primary School Group, the first place in the list of winners "Bionic Six-legged Robot Field Data Detection and Image Transmission System" has aroused doubts. Some netizens said: The competition is for the young master to brush up his record. 
Xinchang County Science and Technology Association responded: If you have doubts, ask them face to face, just treat it as a trip.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Sunac China Holdings, a Chinese real estate developer in default, has received a liquidation application in Hong Kong, and market concerns about the company's debt repayment ability have recently heated up again.
Bloomberg reported that the liquidation application was filed by China Cinda Asset Management Co., Ltd. in Hong Kong, and the hearing is scheduled for March 19. 
Previously, a similar lawsuit against Sunac China was withdrawn in 2023, and now the company is facing a crisis again.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Global Times launched a questionnaire survey of 51,000 people in 46 countries to understand how foreign countries feel about China's changes and how they view China's development.
The survey data shows that China's development prospects are bright, and "strong economic strength" has the highest recognition rate, reaching 77%.
The survey found that nearly 80% of foreign people are confident in China's development prospects.
The survey data shows that foreign people have a high degree of favorability and a good impression of China, and the proportion of foreign respondents who are interested in China exceeds 90%.
Regarding the comprehensive evaluation of China and the Chinese, nearly 60% of foreign people have a "good" overall impression of China

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 10, Tesla's new Model Y was officially launched on its official Chinese website, and a promotional article titled "New Model Y, despite the comparison" was released. Subsequently, major new car-making forces in China responded one after another.
Among them, Lei Jun responded "OK" Yu Chengdong said that Zhijie R7 still maintains its leading advantage and has a clear lead in some aspects.
Netizens replied: "Even if Xiaomi is included, the market value of these companies is not even a fraction of others"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 8, in Zhuhai, Guangdong, a private enterprise hung a banner to protest that local officials and businessmen colluded to illegally occupy the company's land.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to incomplete statistics from the public account "Parents in the Same City", more than 60 kindergartens and primary schools in Shanghai will be closed in 2024 due to insufficient enrollment.
China's population is shrinking at an accelerated pace, with the total population declining for two consecutive years. China's fertility rate has dropped from 2.6 children per woman in the late 1980s to 1.19 in 2022.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Thai police officer Chen Bajin used Chinese to remind Chinese people not to trust coming to Thailand to work. These recruitment information may be premeditated kidnapping companies, and these companies are all run by Chinese.
At present, Chen Bajin's Douyin account can no longer be searched, and some netizens said that the account has been banned.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Central Commission for Discipline Inspection announced on January 10 that in 2024, 73 provincial and ministerial-level cadres and above, 3,838 department-level cadres, 31,000 county-level cadres, 112,000 township-level cadres, 128,000 general cadres, and 613,000 other personnel in rural areas, enterprises, etc. were punished nationwide.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi announced that China will provide 1 billion yuan in free military aid to Africa to help African countries train 6,000 military talents and 1,000 police law enforcement personnel.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Economist Li Daxiao said on January 10: "The US stock market hides huge risks" 
Netizens mocked him: "This guy is the biggest risk" "Just listen to their words the opposite way"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added that there was a salary increase in Pucheng County, Shaanxi.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a woman posted a message saying that she joined Shenzhen Chuangpus New Energy Company in 2023. In September, the company leader Qin Jingxuan took her on a business trip to Changsha. During the dinner, she was drunk and blacked out because she kept toasting to the leaders. After that, she was molested by Qin Jingxuan. After waking up the next day, Qin Jingxuan entered the hotel room again and molested her. After realizing that something was wrong, he quickly fled the hotel.
After the police filed a case. Qin Jingxuan was not subject to any constraints during the period of bail pending trial and still flew around the country. The police said that the other party had been prepared.
After that, the woman received an identification notice, and the identification results showed that there was DNA of the suspect in her chest, but since then, there has been no progress in the case. The police's reply is always in progress, and the Xiamen police have lost contact and do not reply to messages.
As of now, the article posted by the woman has been deleted by the platform, and many netizens have forwarded it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Xiamen police's case filing notice

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 9, it was reported that Zhou Hongbin, head of the United Front Work Department of Kunming City, was suspected of serious violations of discipline and law and has voluntarily surrendered.
She once said in front of the camera: There is no end to improving people's livelihood, and we must make every citizen's life happier and more fulfilling.
Netizens said: "Her acting skills are so good that she only needs an Oscar to be given a little golden man" "She has no wrinkles at the age of nearly 60, and she has done a lot of medical beauty projects"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At present, more than 1,000 family members trapped in Myanmar have filled out the "Stars Go Home Plan" rescue document.
The document initiator, Ms. Dai, said that on January 9, the document was suspected to be harassed by fraudsters, who left messages saying "I bought a lot of people and killed a lot of people" and some people arrogantly claimed "I killed a lot of people in the Caitong Jinyun Park in Phnom Penh, Cambodia, but I was not caught."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Ouyang Yun, a village bank depositor who was detained for 336 days for provoking disturbances because he went to Henan to ask for his deposit, returned to Changsha yesterday. His wife said that Ouyang Yun lost more than 30 kilograms during his detention, his hair turned completely white, and his face became so thin that he was unrecognizable.
According to informed depositors, another detained village bank depositor, Shi Jianjian, was tortured and forced to confess because he refused to confess. He was often locked up in a small dark room and was not given treatment for his illness.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added that Guizhou’s salary increase situation

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, China has tried a visa-free policy for South Korea to promote consumption. When South Koreans travel to China, some netizens said they would drive luxury cars to give these South Koreans a test drive to open their eyes and amuse them.
Recently, someone started a topic on Weibo, complaining that the middle-parted hairstyle of South Koreans is a "natural birth hairstyle" that looks rustic and lacks masculinity.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 7, a netizen posted that he had a long-vacant property in Haikou City, which was recently sealed by the court and entered the judicial auction process, but he was unaware of it. 
Later, he learned that it was a misunderstanding. The defendant had the same name as himself and owed a huge amount of money that he was unable to repay. The netizen questioned: Why didn't the court verify the identity information and phone information of the owner? He also questioned the plaintiff and the court for suspected intentional occupation of his property.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Bloomberg: Millions of young people choose to withdraw from the state pension plan, and the resistance to pensions poses a new threat. More than 20 million workers will retire each year in the next decade, and the record low birth rate means that fewer people will enter the labor market to pay pensions. Without additional fiscal support, the pensions serving 460 million workers will be in deficit for the first time in four years. For many, reform may be too late. While it is difficult to determine the exact number of people whose pensions have been interrupted, according to Bloomberg's calculations based on data compiled by the think tank Chinese Academy of Social Sciences, it is estimated that tens of millions of people have stopped paying.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 10, [People's Daily firmly says no to fabricating and spreading stock market rumors] The capital market is an "information + confidence" market. It is crucial to combat capital market rumors and punish them in a timely manner. 
On December 29 last year, Financial Investment News: The Shanghai Composite Index is expected to challenge 4,000 points in the short term, and is expected to hit a new high of 6,124 points in 2025 to challenge 7,100 points.
